org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.nodemanager.containermanager

接口 ContainerManager

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.ContainerManagementProtocol, org.apache.hadoop.yarn.event.EventHandler<ContainerManagerEvent>, org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateChangeListener
    所有已知实现类:
    ContainerManagerImpl

    public interface ContainerManager
extends org.apache.hadoop.service.ServiceStateChangeListener, org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.ContainerManagementProtocol, org.apache.hadoop.yarn.event.EventHandler<ContainerManagerEvent>
    The ContainerManager is an entity that manages the life cycle of Containers.
